column1:
Income inequality, quintile ratio
SDG 10.1 By 2030, progressively achieve and sustain income growth of the bottom 40 per cent of the population at a rate higher than the national average
Dimension: Inequality
Definition: Ratio of the average income of the richest 20 percent of the population to the average income of the poorest 20 percent of the population.
Source: HDRO calculations based on data from World Bank (2019a). World Development Indicators database. Washington, DC. http://data.worldbank.org. Accessed on 15 July 2019.

column2: Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development

column1: a: Data refer to the most recent year available during the period specified.
